definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: These people are called 'Robust' by archaeologists because of their heavy-boned physique.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們粗壯的體型而被考古學者稱爲粗壯型南猿。

sentences.english: This is the website of Archaeology Data Service.
sentences.chinese: 這是考古學數據服務網的網站。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have solved an ancient mystery surrounding the famous Easter Island statues.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家發現著名的復活節島巨古石像的祕密。

sentences.english: Many specialistic techniques contribute to archaeology .
sentences.chinese: 許多專業技術對考古學作出貢獻。

sentences.english: Gradually the archaeologists made the ancient site give up its secrets.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家們逐漸使古遺址失了神祕密感。

sentences.english: Four years ago, Waldo directed a pair of archaeology students to the site.
sentences.chinese: 四年前，瓦爾多引導了幾個考古學的學生去那個地方。

sentences.english: Also archaeological evidence contradicts the picture in Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 而考古學證據也與《約書亞書》的描述矛盾。

sentences.english: For me, archaeology is about having a good time.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，考古學應該是一件很快樂的事情。

sentences.english: This article is an integrative research about the Xing Kiln in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本文是對唐代邢窯的考古學初步綜合研究。

sentences.english: Foreign archaeologists are arriving one after another.
sentences.chinese: 外國的考古學者們聯翩而至。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have unearthed evidence of glass-working and bone-carving workshops.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家已發現了玻璃作坊和骨雕作坊的證據。

sentences.english: The archaeologist dated the ruins as belonging to the early Minoan period.
sentences.chinese: 這位考古學家確定該廢墟屬於早期彌諾斯時期。

sentences.english: The archaeologist estimated that the vase was 3,500 years old.
sentences.chinese: 考古學者推斷那隻花瓶大約有三千五百年之久。

sentences.english: I am merely restating those facts which are widely accepted by the world's archeological community.
sentences.chinese: 我純粹的只是想重申那些被考古學界廣泛接受的事實。

sentences.english: What cursed secrets have these archaeologists unearthed beneath the town?
sentences.chinese: 什麼詛咒的祕密有這些考古學家出土的鎮下？

sentences.english: Her novel featured a mummy coming back to life and seeking revenge against an archaeologist.
sentences.chinese: 她的小說表現了一個木乃伊復活並向考古學家復仇。

definition: to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
